title: Two examples concerning existential undecidability in fields. (arXiv:2211.01775v1 [math.LO])
description: We construct an existentially undecidable complete discretely valued field of mixed characteristic with existentially decidable residue field and decidable algebraic part, answering a question by Anscombe-Fehm in a strong way. Along the way, we construct an existentially decidable field of positive characteristic with an existentially undecidable finite extension, modifying a construction due to Kesavan Thanagopal.
dc:creator: Philip Dittmann
